nodes.bodyText: this is the vanilla method name, this is not my personal choice =D
that's annoying, guess MCP has a typo then lol
i suggest prefixing this with "Item", confusing otherwise
maybe == 19 or so? to make sure it doesnt despawn right when you spawn it
Did you try a different size for the boss? might look nice
